name: Galour
description:
Galour - Where Galaga meets colour theory! 

Shoot enemies with coloured bullets to turn them white. Rack up your score with consecutive shots and aim for a high score!

Created and submitted for the Vancouver Global Game Jam 2018, with the theme "Transmission"! For this game, I focused on colour transmission, where you must transmit coloured light onto your enemies to turn them white. 

Vancouver Global Game Jam 2018 submission page: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/galour

Paid version available with sound effects, updates and more! Currently in development.
